languages.text: "Осторожнее со словами, Вольный Торговец. Поверьте, если понадобится — я осужу. И если вам мои аргументы кажутся неубедительными, это решительно ничего не поменяет. Главное, чтобы они казались убедительными мне".

"Be careful with your words, Rogue Trader. I assure you, if the need arises, I'll require no invitation. And if my arguments sound unconvincing to you, it will not change a thing. All that matters is whether or not they sound convincing to me."
languages.original_text: "Осторожнее со словами, Вольный Торговец. Поверьте, если понадобится — я осужу. И если вам мои аргументы кажутся неубедительными, это решительно ничего не поменяет. Главное, чтобы они казались убедительными мне".

traits.locale_text: "Be careful with your words, Rogue Trader. I assure you, if the need arises, I'll require no invitation. And if my arguments will sound unconvincing to you, it will not change a thing. All that matters is whether or not they will sound convincing to me."

"Be careful with your words, Rogue Trader. I assure you, if the need arises, I'll require no invitation. And if my arguments will sound unconvincing to you, it will not change a thing. All that matters is whether or not they will sound convincing to me."

"Be careful with your words, Rogue Trader. I assure you, if the need arises, I'll require no invitation. And if my arguments sound unconvincing to you, it will not change a thing. All that matters is whether or not they sound convincing to me."

"Be careful with your words, Rogue Trader. I assure you, if the need arises, I'll require no invitation. And if my arguments sound unconvincing to you, it will not change a thing. All that matters is whether or not they sound convincing to me."

languages.text: 「言葉は慎重に選びたまえ、自由開拓者。安心しろ、その必要が生じても招待は不要。私の主張でお前が納得しなかったとしても、事は変わらぬ。あらゆる案件は、私を納得させられるか否かで判断される」
languages.original_text: "Be careful with your words, Rogue Trader. I assure you, if the need arises, I'll require no invitation. And if my arguments sound unconvincing to you, it will not change a thing. All that matters is whether or not they sound convincing to me."

traits.locale_text: 「言葉は慎重に選びたまえ、自由開拓者。安心しろ、その必要が生じても招待は不要。私の主張でお前が納得しなかったとしても、事は変わらぬ。あらゆる案件は、私を納得させられるか否かで判断される」

languages.original_text: "Be careful with your words, Rogue Trader. I assure you, if the need arises, I'll require no invitation. And if my arguments sound unconvincing to you, it will not change a thing. All that matters is whether or not they sound convincing to me."

languages.text: “注意你的态度，行商浪人。我向你保证，如果有这个必要，我当仁不让。至于这样的怀疑有没有道理，你怎么想并不重要，重要的是我认为它有道理。”
languages.original_text: "Be careful with your words, Rogue Trader. I assure you, if the need arises, I'll require no invitation. And if my arguments sound unconvincing to you, it will not change a thing. All that matters is whether or not they sound convincing to me."

traits.locale_text: “注意你的态度，行商浪人。我向你保证，如果有这个必要，我当仁不让。至于这样的怀疑有没有道理，你怎么想并不重要，重要的是我认为它有道理。”

languages.text: «Cuidado con lo que dice, Comerciante Independiente. Le aseguro que, si llega el momento, no necesitaré invitación alguna. Y dará igual si mis argumentos le convencen o no. Lo único que importará es que me convenzan a mí».
languages.original_text: "Be careful with your words, Rogue Trader. I assure you, if the need arises, I'll require no invitation. And if my arguments sound unconvincing to you, it will not change a thing. All that matters is whether or not they sound convincing to me."

traits.locale_text: «Cuidado con lo que dice, Comerciante Independiente. Le aseguro que, si llega el momento, no necesitaré invitación alguna. Y dará igual si mis argumentos le convencen o no. Lo único que importará es que me convenzan a mí».

languages.text: « Mesurez vos paroles, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, et rassurez-vous : le moment venu, je n'attendrai pas d'invitation. Sachez que je n'ai pas besoin que vous trouviez mes arguments convaincants. Tout ce qui compte, c'est qu'ils me convainquent, moi. »
languages.original_text: "Be careful with your words, Rogue Trader. I assure you, if the need arises, I'll require no invitation. And if my arguments sound unconvincing to you, it will not change a thing. All that matters is whether or not they sound convincing to me."

traits.locale_text: « Mesurez vos paroles, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, et rassurez-vous : le moment venu, je n'attendrai pas d'invitation. Sachez que je n'ai pas besoin que vous trouviez mes arguments convaincants. Tout ce qui compte, c'est qu'ils me convainquent, moi. »

languages.text: "Achtet auf Eure Worte, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich versichere Euch, ich brauche im Bedarfsfall keine Einladung. Und wenn meine Argumente Euch nicht überzeugen, macht das keinen Unterschied. Wichtig ist allein, ob sie mich überzeugen oder nicht."
languages.original_text: "Be careful with your words, Rogue Trader. I assure you, if the need arises, I'll require no invitation. And if my arguments sound unconvincing to you, it will not change a thing. All that matters is whether or not they sound convincing to me."

traits.locale_text: "Achtet auf Eure Worte, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich versichere Euch, ich brauche im Bedarfsfall keine Einladung. Und wenn meine Argumente Euch nicht überzeugen, macht das keinen Unterschied. Wichtig ist allein, ob sie mich überzeugen oder nicht."

languages.text: "Sözlerini dikkatli seç Hür Tacir. Seni temin ederim ki öyle bir ihtiyaç ortaya çıkarsa herhangi bir davete ihtiyaç duymam. Argümanlarımın sana ikna edici gelmiyor oluşu, hiçbir şeyi değiştirmez. Bana ikna edici geliyor olmaları yeterli."
languages.original_text: "Be careful with your words, Rogue Trader. I assure you, if the need arises, I'll require no invitation. And if my arguments sound unconvincing to you, it will not change a thing. All that matters is whether or not they sound convincing to me."

traits.locale_text: "Sözlerini dikkatli seç Hür Tacir. Seni temin ederim ki öyle bir ihtiyaç ortaya çıkarsa herhangi bir davete ihtiyacım olmaz. Argümanlarımın sana ikna edici gelmiyor oluşu hiçbir şeyi değiştirmez. Bana ikna edici geliyor olmaları yeterli."
